title: Rebuilding
description:
Matthew Homenick, Ashton Cynthia Clarke and Kevin McGeehan share stories about a breakdown at yoga class, tension at the airport, and a fateful bank robbery.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Trent Reznor, Atticus Ross, Matthew Homenick, Jason Headley, Rhiannon Giddens, Amythyst Kiah, Kevin McGeehan, Jeff Tweedy, Our Native Daughters, Kevin Allison, Allison Russell, Ashton Cynthia Clarke)
